description:
Uomi, the Eiryou student council president, visits Ousai. Tsuda studies for tests with everyone. During Golden Week, the gang goes to an amusement park owned by the Shichijou group.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Emphasis on VVV / Moe Tail / Groundbreaking Skin Peeling
Kyouchou Bui Buibuibui / Moe Tail / Kakkiteki Zuru Muke
強調部位ブイブイブイ / 萌えテイル / 画期的ズルむけ
